text: Giulia Ghiretti (born 16 February 1994 in Parma) is an Italian swimmer. Grimaldi an athlete of the Gruppo Sportivo Fiamme Oro. == Biography == Ghiretti was originally a trampolinist until a training accident in January 2010 which caused her spinal injury. In 2011 she began swimming, and made her international competitive debut at the 2013 IPC Swimming World Championships in Montreal. At the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio she won a bronze medal in the 50m Butterfly S5, and a silver in the 100m Breaststroke SB4. ==Achievements== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |- !
